ResearchProjectDef.label: Chemfuel Refining Tier 2
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research how to refine deepchem into chemfuel faster.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Neutroamine Refining Tier 2
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research how to refine deepchem into neutroamine faster.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dye Refining Tier 2
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research how to refine chemfuel into dye faster.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Textile Refining II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research how to refine deepchem into unrefined fibers, intermediate material from which threads can be woven.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Raw Plasteel Refining II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research how to refine raw plasteel from deepchem into usable plasteel. Raw plasteel is useless on its own and can only be cured into plasteel. The process involves using a refinery to extract the impurities, followed by curing the refined plasteel at a smelter.
